verses.verse: At the conclusion. For the sons of Kora. A Psalm concerning hidden things. GOD is our refuge and strength; our helper in the troubles which often befal us.
Therefore we will not be dismayed, though the earth be shaken, and mountains be hurled to the midst of seas.
Their waters roared and were troubled. By his power the mountains were convulsed.
The swelling streams of this river gladden the city of God: the Most High hath hallowed his own dwelling:
God is in the midst of it; it cannot be shaken; God by his presence will support it.
The nations were troubled, kingdoms tottered; he uttered his voice, the earth was shaken.
The Lord of armies is with us; our helper is the God of Jacob.
Come and see the works of the Lord: The wonders which he hath done on the earth:
he is making wars to cease to the ends of the earth. He will break the bow and shiver the lance, and shields he will utterly consume with fire.
Be still and know that I am God: let me be exalted among the nations, let me be exalted in the earth.
The Lord of armies is with us, our helper is the God of Jacob.
